data.text:
The animal joining our fleet tomorrow likes to howl out the moon and is the most endangered of its kind. Can you guess the animal?

Tune back into tomorrow to greet our newest friend!
@bonniebell Oh yes, please follow us and you should be able to comment! Thanks:)

data.text: GIVEAWAY ALERT! We want you to win two round-trip tickets on Frontier! ⁠🏖️ ⁠Simply follow us on Instagram, like and comment on our latest Instagram post, (@FlyFrontier –– not here!), and you'll be entered to win! Official rules: https://t.co/cl6fgvPkc0. https://t.co/VxxIl7VNwQ

At Frontier, we believe The Sky is for Everyone and we deliver on this vision through our unique brand of Low Fares Done Right.

Get to know us here: https://t.co/mcwL56ezD8 https://t.co/qPtLJ1JFMG

data.text:
RT @VisitSarasota: Happy #WorldOceansDay! Seas the day by treating our beautiful oceans and its marine with love! 🌊❤️🦈#MySarasota

📍 Mote M…

Under the sea
Darling it's better
Down where it's wetter
Take it from...our aquatic friends!
#WorldOceansDay

Get to know our aquatic friends at https://t.co/DInOJaupB9! 

Tell us who's your fav with an emoji in the comments section!🐢🐋🐬 https://t.co/rgiX9sTmQB

One of our newest plane tails, Verde the Resplendent Quetzal seen here with Wilbur the Whitetail.
⁠⁠
The resplendent quetzal is the national bird of Guatemala. 💚⁠⁠ @guatemala_dgac
⁠⁠
You can learn more about Verde at https://t.co/ZxsEfeGalo.
⁠⁠
📸: Zach Parks https://t.co/0gtglB7bes

The mountains are calling and we must go!

Today we began nonstop flights between Durango, CO (@VisitDurango) to Denver, CO (@DENAirport)!

To 🎉 the new service, we'll be offering introductory fares starting at $39*. https://t.co/lRZ0lryuln https://t.co/U0CWI1KP2R

data.text:
THE ONE WHERE Friends Fly Free! https://t.co/gvs5uXoLN8

For a limited time only, Discount Den Members have exclusive access to our buy-one-get-one companion discount.

Buy by 5/26/21 and travel on 6/8/21. Route exclusions apply. 

Use promo code: FRIENDS  

#BestFriendsDay https://t.co/c1nFf0R7Ui

Tampa said yes to being our Bae! We are excited to announce the opening of our new crew base at @FlyTPA! TPA will be home to nearly 400 pilots and Flight Attendants. Learn more about this exciting announcement here: https://t.co/6bl6qMjIfB

We look forward to welcoming Upstate New Yorkers onboard for their next ☀️ filled vacation this summer! https://t.co/T7RdsnQgIz

We are going green in more ways than one! Welcome our newest tail, Verde ("green" in Spanish) the Resplendent Quetzal!

Frontier is dedicated to bringing awareness to endangered species. 💚

You can learn more about Verde here: https://t.co/l5qvj3YIkJ 

@guatemala_dgac https://t.co/1K9kN3C7Sz

The animal joining our fleet tomorrow equally shares our 💚 of all things green. Can you guess the animal?

Hint(s): Its iridescent green tail feathers are symbols for spring plant growth, goodness and light. https://t.co/Ooe24j3w0H
Check out our latest video on #TikTok! https://t.co/fO33glw17P
